objectives: Students will discuss technology in daily life using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Business/Corporate themed scenarios related to technology in daily life
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining technology in daily life content with Business/Corporate narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore technology in daily life through a Business/Corporate lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a corporate or business challenge involving technology in daily life

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to technology in daily life in a business context
Students engage in business themed role-play about technology in daily life using informal register
Students create original business themed content about technology in daily life in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe technology in daily life in a Business/Corporate scenario?
What strategy or negotiation might be involved in technology in daily life?
Can you create a Business/Corporate story about technology in daily life?
How does technology in daily life change when viewed through a Business/Corporate perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this business scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Business/Corporate situation involving technology in daily life
roles: Character A: Using informal register in business context
Character B: Responding in informal register within business theme

topic_genre_blend: technology in daily life with strategy
technology in daily life with negotiation
technology in daily life with stakeholder

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Business/Corporate theme: Professional scenarios, workplace situations

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Business/Corporate themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
